messages: ["",%1$s,{"text":" 被踢出了这个世界,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 变为了一块充满弹性的墓碑,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 踩到了乐高积木,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 的脚趾磕到了桌角,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",{"text":" 现已将 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%1$s,{"text":" 加入 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s,{"text":" 豪华套餐 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"}]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 听到了一个不好笑的笑话,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 石头剪刀布输了,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 不知道要买百事还是可口可乐,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 被送去见奥库瑞姆了,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 被管理员禁言了29天23小时59分钟,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 被空气迎头痛击,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 想不清楚为什么世界上没有北瓜,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 遇到了电车难题,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 突然意识到225×2不是550,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 在土豆里吃到了姜,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 的薯条没有番茄酱,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 发现自己的电脑盘红条了,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 的手机没接上充电线,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 算错了1+1等于多少,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
["",%1$s,{"text":" 看着自己的内脏变成了“外脏”,凶手是 ","bold":true,"color":"dark_red"},%2$s]
